title: Great Mage With Cheat

status: God of All People: Only I Can See Hidden Information.; Great Mage With Cheat; Quánmín Shén Zhàn: Zhǐyǒu Wǒ Néng Kàn Dào Yǐncáng Xìnxī; Quanmin Shen Zhan: Zhiyou Wo Neng Kan Dao Yincang Xinxi
description:
Description :
        Great Mage With CheatIn 2034, the long-awaited final game "G** Wars" was released. As a professional player, after encountering an accident in reality, I was able to see the "hidden information" that ordinary people cannot see. "Congratulations, you have obtained the legendary hidden professionGreat Mage!"
